definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The basic function of management is to seek the way of knowledge-transfer.
sentences.chinese: 管理的最基本職能是尋求知識轉化的路徑與結點。

sentences.english: A model and its formula of 3-D 10-node mapped infinite element for intercalations in rock engineering are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出三維10結點映射夾層無限元模型及相應算式。

sentences.english: Unlabelled terminals must not be used as "tie points" for other wires.
sentences.chinese: 不可將無標號的接線端當成其它導線的“結點”。

sentences.english: It is shown that the model undergoes saddle-node bifurcation and Hopf bifurcation.
sentences.chinese: 該模型經歷了鞍結點分支和霍普夫分支。

sentences.english: C-sf22 lead single node chain and the addition of data can be deleted.
sentences.chinese: sf22帶頭結點的單鏈表，可以刪除添加數據。

sentences.english: Delete these two nodes before we start drawing the model.
sentences.chinese: 在開始繪製模型之前將這兩個結點刪除。

sentences.english: The crux of the algorithm comes in determining whether a node is the root of a strongly connected component.
sentences.chinese: 算法的關鍵是判斷一個結點是否是強連通分量的根。

sentences.english: Using the sketch, it is now possible to tabulate the coordinates of all the nodes .
sentences.chinese: 應用草圖，現在可以將所有結點的座標移製成表。

sentences.english: The server endpoint cannot perform the operation.
sentences.chinese: 服務器終結點無法運行操作。

sentences.english: This sticking point would affect a grand total of, say, ten players.
sentences.chinese: 而這個糾結點只會影響到攏共十名左右的球員。

sentences.english: For example, a book composed of chapters has culmination and termination points.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一本由章節組成的書，有高潮及終結點。

sentences.english: You can even nest nodes within nodes.
sentences.chinese: 您甚至可以組成網狀結點。

sentences.english: It can also create sequences of atomic values, which might be confused with node-sets.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以創建原子值序列，這有可能與結點集混淆。

sentences.english: Human beings are principal parts in studying ecological environment and the end of all of the problems.
sentences.chinese: 研究生態環境，人是主體，也是所有問題的歸結點。

sentences.english: Usually the numerical manifold method(NMM) is based on meshes of three- or four-node element.
sentences.chinese: 數值流形方法常基於有限元法三結點或四結點單元。

sentences.english: Usually the numerical manifold method(NMM) is based on meshes of three- or four-node element.
sentences.chinese: 數值流形方法常基於有限元法三結點或四結點單元。

definition: hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
to cut ties/to disconnect/out of touch
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
